name: All-In-One Sports VR : Global
abstract: All in One sports VR offers the most safe way to keep you healthy for both physically and mentally with zero contact.

detail.app_release_note:
1.3.0 Version Update Summary Hello, players! We've got exciting news for you. The latest update brings new features and improvements to enhance your gaming experience.
<General Improvements>
a. Matching System Improvements
Reduced wait times for random matches. If the wait is too long, you'll be matched with an AI opponent.
b.Timeout Loss Penalty
Players exceeding the time limit twice will be automatically defeated, ensuring smooth and fair gameplay.
c.New Tool Cosmetics
Earn new cosmetics by achieving milestones. Equip them to showcase your style in the game!
d.Spectator Cheering Tools Update
Added Lightsaber and Fireworks for spectators to enhance cheering.

Specific Game Updates
a. Table Tennis
Rally Scoring Rule Change: If your opponent's return doesn't hit the table, you win the point.
Serve Spin Adjustment: Serve spin strength reduced by 50%.
b. Badminton
Serve Rule Adjustment: Serve without holding the shuttlecock for more dynamic play.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro, PICO 4 Ultra
